news.title: 俄罗斯将军在莫斯科遭枪击受伤
news.title0: Russian general shot several times in Moscow
news.content: 俄罗斯军事情报总局（GRU）高级将领阿列克谢耶夫中将在莫斯科一公寓楼外遭枪击，身中数枪后被送医。
news.content0: A high-profile general in Russia's military has been shot several times and wounded in Moscow.
news.author: BBC

news.title: 加拿大与法国将在格陵兰开设领事馆
news.title0: Canada and France to open Greenland consulates after Trump demands
news.content: 加拿大和法国宣布将在格陵兰开设领事馆，以展示对格陵兰的支持，回应特朗普此前对该领土的威胁。
news.content0: Canada is set to open its first diplomatic outpost in Greenland in a significant show of solidarity following US President Donald Trump's threats to take control of the territory.
news.author: BBC

news.title: 卢浮宫遭劫皇后王冠被压扁但可修复
news.title0: Louvre Museum crown left crushed but 'intact' after raid
news.content: 卢浮宫去年10月遭劫，法国欧仁妮皇后的钻石王冠被窃贼逃跑时掉落压扁，但博物馆称其“几乎完好”，可完全修复。
news.content0: The crown of French Empress Eugenie was left crushed after being dropped by fleeing thieves during the raid at the Louvre last October - but is "nearly intact" and can be fully restored, the museum has said.
news.author: BBC

news.title: 加拿大公布汽车业计划以摆脱对美依赖
news.title0: Canada unveils auto industry plan in latest pivot away from US
news.content: 加拿大总理公布新计划，通过激励措施和电动车补贴支持本国汽车业，以应对美国关税并减少对美依赖。
news.content0: Prime Minister Mark Carney has unveiled a plan to bolster Canada's car industry and support its electric vehicle transition, as the sector buckles under the weight of US tariffs.
news.author: BBC

news.title: 美伊高级官员将在阿曼举行会谈
news.title0: US and Iran talks to begin as fears of direct conflict continue
news.content: 美伊高级官员将在阿曼举行直接会谈，试图缓解紧张局势，避免军事对抗。双方在谈判范围上仍存分歧。
news.content0: Senior US and Iranian officials are expected to meet in Oman for direct talks in the coming hours, amid a crisis that has raised fears of a military confrontation between the two countries.
news.author: BBC

news.title: 布里斯班公布23亿澳元奥运主场馆设计
news.title0: Plans for $2.3 billion stadium ignite debate in 2032 Olympics host city
news.content: 澳大利亚布里斯班公布2032年奥运会主场馆设计，灵感来自当地“昆士兰”式住宅，耗资23亿澳元，引发争议。
news.content0: Officials in Brisbane, Australia, have revealed plans for 2032’s Olympic stadium: a $2.3 billion venue inspired by the state’s typical suburban homes, known as “Queenslanders” — residential architecture that may be familiar to fans of Brisbane-based cartoon, “Bluey.”
news.author: CNN

news.title: 姐妹被困苏格兰古堡60英尺高墙
news.title0: The sisters who got stuck in a Scottish castle
news.content: 两名姐妹在苏格兰邓斯塔夫纳奇城堡参观时，意外被困在约60英尺高的古城墙顶部，无法找到出路。
news.content0: Niki Ghofranian surveyed the view from atop the stone walls of Dunstaffnage Castle, hoping, against the odds, to find a way out.
news.author: CNN

news.title: 土拨鼠预测：还有六周寒冬
news.title0: What did the groundhog see? Punxsutawney Phil’s winter prediction is in
news.content: 美国宾州著名“气象预报员”土拨鼠菲尔在“土拨鼠日”出洞后看到了自己的影子，预示冬天还将持续六周。
news.content0: Punxsutawney Phil, the groundhog weather icon, saw his shadow when he was plucked from his warm burrow and thrust out into the frigid air Monday morning. According to Phil, that means six more weeks of winter are ahead.
news.author: CNN

news.title: 美国与哥伦比亚总统将举行关键会晤
news.title0: From clash to dialogue: Petro arrives in Washington for key encounter with Trump after year of tensions
news.content: 哥伦比亚总统佩特罗抵达华盛顿，将与美国总统特朗普举行关键会晤，试图结束两国长达一年的紧张关系。
news.content0: After a year of insults, threats, tariffs and sanctions, the leaders of the US and Colombia will meet in Washington on Tuesday in an apparent attempt to put their bitter feud behind them.
news.author: CNN
